org.kohsuke.args4j
Class Config

java.lang.Object
  org.kohsuke.args4j.Config

public class Config
extends Object

Metadataconfiguration. This class holds all metadata for a class, mainly a list of @Options and @Arguments.

Author:
Jan Materne
